title: Prevention of Information Blocking Attestation
description:
I have not  knowingly and willfully take action to limit or restrict the interoperability of certified EHR technology.
I have responded to requests to retrieve or exchange informationâ€”including requests from patients and other health care providers regardless of the requestor's affiliation or technology.
I have implemented appropriate standards and processes to ensure that its certified EHR technology was connected in accordance with applicable law and standards, allowed patients timely access to their electronic health information; and supported exchange of electronic health information with other health care providers.

title: Diabetes: Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) Poor Control (>9%)
description: Percentage of patients 18-75 years of age with diabetes who had hemoglobin A1c > 9.0% during the measurement period
